thread.title: Snooki slams Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate'
thread.title_full: Snooki slams Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate'

title: Snooki slams Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate'
text: > Entertainment Snooki slams Chris Christie, says expression 'full of hate' FILE - In this May 29, 2014 file photo, Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi attends WE tv's "Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars" party in New York. In a book published this week, Polizzi, a cast member on the MTV reality series "Jersey Shore," recalls an encounter with New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie, saying his expression was “full of hate” after she introduced herself in 2013 when both were on the boardwalk in Seaside Heights. Their tense encounter was caught on video and recounted in “Strong is the New Sexy,” in a passage titled “The Governor of New Jersey Tried to Eat Me.” (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, FIle)
